title: Petition to delete and nerf Camille at the simultaneously
body:
It's what you've all been waiting for and I'm bringing it to you guys on a silver platter.

Let's start


First off delete her passive


Second off delete her ult

3rd off cut her tether leap in half for 
range and delay the actual travel speed of it by 75%

There you go. She will still delete you 
in lane with zero counterplay but it's a start.

Fck auto correct

replies.body: Neat, another QQ thread from a garbage player.

> [{quoted}](name=MissingKayo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lzgXK14w,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-13T20:00:40.363+0000)
>
> Neat, another QQ thread from a garbage player.

Neat, another small kid with a big mouth.

She has counterplay in her kit and multiple champion counters. Just like jayce and pantheon she requires you to play really safe in the first 5 levels, after with ulti and a first or second back for items many champions begin to outscale a 0/0/0 camile.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lzgXK14w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-13T18:14:48.110+0000)
>
> She has counterplay in her kit and multiple champion counters. Just like jayce and pantheon she requires you to play really safe in the first 5 levels, after with ulti and a first or second back for items many champions begin to outscale a 0/0/0 camile.

lol wrong
